Class ec.e.util.DiscreteEnumeration

Class ec.e.util.DiscreteEnumeration 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.util.DiscreteEnumeration
public class DiscreteEnumeration
extends Object
implements Enumeration
A utility class that provides enumerations over small, fixed-size groups of objects.

DiscreteEnumeration(Object)
Make an Enumeration over one object
DiscreteEnumeration(Object, Object)
Make an Enumeration over two objects
DiscreteEnumeration(Object, Object, Object)
Make an Enumeration over three objects
DiscreteEnumeration(Object, Object, Object, Object)
Make an Enumeration over four objects
DiscreteEnumeration(Object, Object, Object, Object, Object)
Make an Enumeration over five objects

hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.

DiscreteEnumeration 
  public DiscreteEnumeration(Object obj1)
Make an Enumeration over one object
DiscreteEnumeration 
  public DiscreteEnumeration(Object obj1,
                             Object obj2)
Make an Enumeration over two objects
DiscreteEnumeration 
  public DiscreteEnumeration(Object obj1,
                             Object obj2,
                             Object obj3)
Make an Enumeration over three objects
DiscreteEnumeration 
  public DiscreteEnumeration(Object obj1,
                             Object obj2,
                             Object obj3,
                             Object obj4)
Make an Enumeration over four objects
DiscreteEnumeration 
  public DiscreteEnumeration(Object obj1,
                             Object obj2,
                             Object obj3,
                             Object obj4,
                             Object obj5)
Make an Enumeration over five objects

hasMoreElements 
  public boolean hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
Returns:
true iff we're not done yet.
nextElement 
  public Object nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.
Returns:
The next element in the Enumeration.
